sentences.sContent: He was about to offer an explanation, but she was beginning to laugh.
sentences.sCn: 他刚要加以解释，她就开始笑起来了。

sentences.sContent: I just couldn't laugh at his jokes the way I used to.
sentences.sCn: 我就是不能像以前那样笑他讲的笑话。

sentences.sContent: "We could do with some help from our friends," he laughed.
sentences.sCn: “如果我们朋友来帮助就好了，”他笑着说道。

phrases.pCn: v. 笑在最后；取得最后胜利
[美国俚语]为了取乐，当作消遣，借以开心
不信任的嘲笑；大声狂笑；哈哈大笑
用笑驱除恐惧等；付之一笑；谈笑中消磨时间

remMethod.val: 网络聊天用语lol(laugh out loudly)是“放声大笑”的意思

trans.tranOther: When you laugh, you make a sound with your throat while smiling and show that you are happy or amused. People also sometimes laugh when they feel nervous or are being unfriendly.
